name: Endless Evasion
description:
ENDLESS EVASION

Do not try to find an exit, just try not to get killed.

Controls :
  • WASD : move
  • Left Click : use item
  • E : pick up item
  • Q : drop item
  • 123/Scroll : select item
  • Esc : pause game
This game is in very (very) early development.

I'd enjoy receiving feedback, ideas and bug report (in the comments or on the Discord server), but please don't complain about the following known issues.

Known bugs
  • Guard animations glitch
  • Guard spawn inconsistency (you haven't seen any guards since 5 minutes and suddenly you get chased by 5 of them)
  • Gun doesn't work sometimes
  • Player is taking damage when hitting guard with a knife
Planned features
  • A lot of new items (guns, other consumables...)
  • Score (how much time you survived, guard kills...)
  • Different floors with different themes and textures
  • More enemy types
Discord server :

Join our Discord server to stay up-to-date and suggest features !
